title: Ello Gov'nor
description: A British taxi is possessed by the soul of its driver, seeking revenge on the lowly gang members who murdered him. Pay the fare... or pay the price.
altHero: an evil taxi with large sharp teeth springs from behind a shower curtain
alt1: a boy opens his notebook and inside is a tire tread mark
alt2: a woman brushes her hair in the bathroom looking frightened
alt3: from inside the taxi, a man and his dog walk on the sidewalk
alt4: the taxi chomps its sharp teeth on a man’s body
